item.title: Amtliches Bulletin: records of speeches, amendments and votes -- Part 1
item.description: In this blogpost we give an overview over the information contained in the Amtliches Bulletin—our second main source of data. As a reminder, the records of the Swiss parliament are documented in three different types of documents (see our blogpost on this here). While the summary documents contain an overview over all discussed bills (described in detail here (Part 1) and here (Part 2)), the Amtliches Bulletin is our main source for parliamentary speeches and votes.
